name: Christmas Redemption
description:
In this game you play as a child who has been very naughty this year and has 1 hour until christmas day to redeem himself and get a nice present. 

You will become nicer by helping other children by giving them cookies, giving them presents or saving their cats from being stuck on a tree.

-- Controlls --

Move - WASD (or arrow keys)

Throw cookie - Left mouse button

Pick up/put down items - Right mouse button

Jump - Space

Buy presents - E
